game.name: Land Drifters
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Land Drifters is an incremental RPG game that can be played idle or active. Explore islands, unlock new skills and combat classes, overcome obstacles, and more! The game is jam-packed with many paths of progression intertwined throughout the game!
